languages.text: {n}Паскаль, вознеся краткую двоичную молитву, вводит команду за командой, творя ловушку для духа машины, живущего в алтаре. Порожденный манипуляциями {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g} код заставляет его впасть в смятение, забиться в силке невыполнимых приказов, раскалить платы алтаря и навеки сгинуть в снопах искр, вылетающих из плавящейся проводки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Паскаль, вознеся краткую двоичную молитву, вводит команду за командой, творя ловушку для духа машины, живущего в алтаре. Порожденный манипуляциями {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g} код заставляет его впасть в смятение, забиться в силке невыполнимых приказов, раскалить платы алтаря и навеки сгинуть в снопах искр, вылетающих из плавящейся проводки.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. The code born out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s tinkering causes the spirit to flutter confusedly in a snare of impossible commands, heat up the altar's circuit boards, and perish forever in the showers of sparks that burst forth from the melting wires.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль, вознеся краткую двоичную молитву, вводит команду за командой, творя ловушку для духа машины, живущего в алтаре. languages.text: {n}Pasqal spricht ein kurzes Gebet in Binhärsprech, dann gibt er einen Befehl nach dem anderen ein, um dem Maschinengeist, der dem Altar innewohnt, eine Falle zu stellen. Der vom {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} ersonnene Code führt dazu, dass der Geist verwirrt in den Fesseln unmöglicher Befehle festhängt. Die Schaltplatinen des Altars überhitzen und er verendet für immer in dem Funkenschauer, der aus den schmelzenden Drähten schießt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. The code born out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s tinkering causes the spirit to flutter confusedly in a snare of impossible commands, heat up the altar's circuit boards, and perish forever in the showers of sparks that burst forth from the melting wires.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal spricht ein kurzes Gebet in Binhärsprech, dann gibt er einen Befehl nach dem anderen ein, um dem Maschinengeist, der dem Altar innewohnt, eine Falle zu stellen. Der vom {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} ersonnene Code führt dazu, dass der Geist verwirrt in den Fesseln unmöglicher Befehle festhängt. Die Schaltplatinen des Altars überhitzen und er verendet für immer in dem Funkenschauer, der aus den schmelzenden Drähten schießt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal récite une courte prière binhaire, avant de saisir les commandes pour mettre en place un piège visant à capturer l'esprit de la machine qui se trouve dans l'autel. Le code du {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} capture l'esprit qui s'agite frénétiquement, faisant surchauffer les circuits imprimés de l'autel et s'anéantissant dans une pluie d'étincelles qui jaillissent des câbles en fusion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. The code born out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s tinkering causes the spirit to flutter confusedly in a snare of impossible commands, heat up the altar's circuit boards, and perish forever in the showers of sparks that burst forth from the melting wires.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal récite une courte prière binhaire, avant de saisir les commandes pour mettre en place un piège visant à capturer l'esprit de la machine qui se trouve dans l'autel. Le code du {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} capture l'esprit qui s'agite frénétiquement, faisant surchauffer les circuits imprimés de l'autel et s'anéantissant dans une pluie d'étincelles qui jaillissent des câbles en fusion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡简短地进行了二进制的祈祷，随后输入一个又一个命令，为居住在这座祭坛的机魂设下陷阱。从{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}手中诞生的代码，将机魂引入了某个不可能实现的命令陷阱中。它混乱地颤动着，加热了祭坛的电路板。随后，被熔化的电线迸裂出火花，那个机魂永远消失了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. The code born out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s tinkering causes the spirit to flutter confusedly in a snare of impossible commands, heat up the altar's circuit boards, and perish forever in the showers of sparks that burst forth from the melting wires.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡简短地进行了二进制的祈祷，随后输入一个又一个命令，为居住在这座祭坛的机魂设下陷阱。从{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}手中诞生的代码，将机魂引入了某个不可能实现的命令陷阱中。它混乱地颤动着，加热了祭坛的电路板。随后，被熔化的电线迸裂出火花，那个机魂永远消失了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルは短く2進数の祈りを捧げ、次から次へとコマンドを入力し、祭壇に宿る機械精霊にかける罠の設定を試みる。{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}がいじくりまわして生まれたコードによるありえないコマンドが精霊を混乱の中で動き回らせる。祭壇の回路基板が熱くなり、溶け落ちるワイヤーから飛び散った火花のシャワーの中で、精霊は永遠にその姿を消した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. The code born out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s tinkering causes the spirit to flutter confusedly in a snare of impossible commands, heat up the altar's circuit boards, and perish forever in the showers of sparks that burst forth from the melting wires.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは短く、2進数の祈りを捧げ、次から次へとコマンドを入力し、祭壇に宿る機械精霊にかける罠の設定を試みる。{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}がいじくりまわして生まれたコードは、ありえないコマンドで精霊を慌てて動き回らせて、祭壇の回路基板は熱くなり、溶けるワイヤーから飛び散る火花のシャワーの中で、精霊は永遠にその姿を消した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal ofrece una breve oración binaria y, a continuación, introduce una orden tras otra para tender una trampa al espíritu máquina que habita en el altar. El código nacido de los trucos del {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tecnosacerdote{/g} hace que el espíritu revolotee confusamente en una trampa de órdenes imposibles, caliente las placas de circuitos del altar y perezca para siempre en las lluvias de chispas que brotan de los cables fundidos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. The code born out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s tinkering causes the spirit to flutter confusedly in a snare of impossible commands, heat up the altar's circuit boards, and perish forever in the showers of sparks that burst forth from the melting wires.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal ofrece una breve oración binaria y, a continuación, introduce una orden tras otra para tender una trampa al espíritu máquina que habita en el altar. El código nacido de los trucos del {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tecnosacerdote{/g} hace que el espíritu revolotee confusamente en una trampa de órdenes imposibles, caliente las placas de circuitos del altar y perezca para siempre en las lluvias de chispas que brotan de los cables fundidos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal kısa bir ikilidil dua okuyor ve sunakta ikamet eden makine ruhunu tuzağa düşürebilmek için komut üstüne komut giriyor. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip'in{/g} rastgele derlediği kod, ruhun imkânsız komutlardan oluşan bir tuzakta şaşkınca çırpınmasına neden oluyor. Bu telaş yüzünden sunağın devre kartları ısınıyor ve sıcaktan eriyen kabloların saçtığı kıvılcımlar arasında sonsuz karanlığa gömülüyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. The code born out of the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s tinkering causes the spirit to flutter confusedly in a snare of impossible commands, heat up the altar's circuit boards, and perish forever in the showers of sparks that burst forth from the melting wires.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal kısa bir ikilidil dua okuyor ve sunakta ikamet eden makine ruhunu tuzağa düşürebilmek için komutlara hızla basıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}'in derlediği kodun karşısında ruhun kafası karışıyor. Ruh telaşlanıp sunağın devrelerini ısıtıyor ve sıcaktan eriyen kabloların saçtığı kıvılcımlar arasında sonsuz karanlığa gömülüyor.{/n}
